meanings.definition: To release or let go of something
meanings.sent1: The firefighter was discharging water onto the burning building.
meanings.sent2: She was discharging her responsibilities diligently.
meanings.sent3: The magician was discharging colorful confetti from his sleeves.
meanings.sent4: The dam was discharging water at an alarming rate.
meanings.sent5: The pressure cooker was discharging steam noisily.

meanings.definition: To perform the duties of a job or responsibility
meanings.sent1: He was discharging his duties as a teacher with dedication.
meanings.sent2: The nurse was discharging her patients after their treatments.
meanings.sent3: The robot was discharging its tasks efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The soldier was discharging his duty to protect the country.
meanings.sent5: The CEO was discharging her responsibilities with authority.

meanings.sent1: The soldier was discharging his rifle during training.
meanings.sent2: The police officer was discharging his firearm to stop the criminal.
meanings.sent3: The cowboy was discharging his revolver in the air for fun.
meanings.sent4: The hunter was discharging his shotgun to scare away the birds.
meanings.sent5: The security guard was discharging his taser to subdue the intruder.

meanings.definition: To release a liquid or gas
meanings.sent1: The factory was discharging pollutants into the river.
meanings.sent2: The volcano was discharging lava and ash during the eruption.
meanings.sent3: The soda can was discharging fizzy bubbles when opened.
meanings.sent4: The exhaust pipe was discharging smoke into the air.
meanings.sent5: The air conditioner was discharging cool air into the room.

meanings.sent1: The port workers were discharging crates from the ship.
meanings.sent2: The flight attendant was discharging passengers from the plane.
meanings.sent3: The truck driver was discharging goods at the warehouse.
meanings.sent4: The bus driver was discharging commuters at the station.
meanings.sent5: The forklift operator was discharging pallets from the truck.
